name: Ball Battle Survival v1
description:
Story:

A ball, which is you, has to fight for its life against the evil king, Purple Patick - the ball king, and survival as long as you can!

How to play:

use A & D to rotate camera and W & S to move forward and back. Whatever direction your camera is facing you go in that direction.

Don't get knocked of the floating island or you die!

Collect upgrades to fight against the enemies!

Upgrades:

Pushback - any enemy that hits up are send flying back

Smash - Smash your enemies! press the left Shift key to smash and send a shock wave knocking enemies away

Rocket Launcher: A very powerful upgrade, press F key to launch rockets at all your enemies!

Boost - This is helpful if you need to escape fast! Press Space to dash in the direction of the camera

Thats all the upgrades!

Good luck!

-Made by Blockhead Manic and with the unity course: Unit 4 - Gameplay Mechanics - Unity Learn
